title: Collect Late Rent and Fees
description: A tenant is 5 days late on rent. The agent must notify the tenant, apply the late fee, and record the communication.

tasks.description: Identify tenants with outstanding balances past the grace period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the delinquent tenant.

tasks.description: Apply the contractual late fee to the tenant's ledger.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the correct late fee amount to the tenant's balance.

tasks.description: Send a formal late rent notice to the tenant via email and log the action in the tenant's communication history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the notice and properly documents the action.
